title: ebay Clone
description: The ebay Clone project is an elegant online shoping built with ReactJS and Chakra UI, offering intuitive navigation, responsive design, detailed product listings, and a secure shopping experience.

title: Adidas
description: The Adidas project is a sleek and modern online store built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features a responsive design, user-friendly navigation, dynamic product displays, and seamless shopping experience. This project showcases the effective use of front-end technologies to create an engaging and interactive e-commerce platform.
